directions.text: Add curry leaves and fry for 30 seconds
Add onions and saute until onions are light brown, about 15 minutes
Add ginger and garlic and saute for about 4 minutes
Add Garam Masala and Turmeric and saute for 30 seconds
Add tomatoes and saute until the oil seperates from the gravy, about 10 minutes
Add tamarind paste, mix and saute for 5 minutes
Turn off the heat, add one half cup of water and mix
Blend the curry for 5 minutes in electric blender and let cool
Put the curry back into the pot, use half cup of water to wash the blender and add to the pot
Add the coconut milk, mix and gently heat the curry
Cook the coconut milk (5 to 10 minutes) while stirring constantly
Increase the heat, bring to a boil (while stirring constantly)
Add the seafood and cook for 5 to 7 minutes (reduce heat after 2)
Adjust the seasonings, garnish with cilantro (optional) and serve
